description: Vendor login (VND-004) depends on the admin approval workflow (ADM-003) to set an account to 'active'.
mitigation_plan: Develop stories in consecutive sprints (Sprint 1 -> Sprint 2) and use feature flags to enable login logic.

description: Customer's ability to see nearby vendors (CUS-010) is meaningless without vendors having products in their catalog (VND-009).
mitigation_plan: Schedule vendor catalog features (Sprint 3) before customer discovery features (Sprint 4).
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire customer-facing shopping experience.

description: The vendor's real-time order dashboard (VND-016) depends on the customer's ability to place an order (CUS-025).
mitigation_plan: Define the 'OrderPlaced' event contract early so the vendor team can build their consumer in parallel against a mock event.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire logistics and delivery workflow.

description: The Rider Allocation system (WI-004-2-1) is triggered when a vendor marks an order 'Ready for Pickup' (VND-021).
mitigation_plan: Ensure the 'OrderReadyForPickup' event is well-defined and tested between the Order and Logistics services.
